name: Attack Spatial animals (Alireza.shokripour)
description:
Complete change of UI(btn,background,healt,lives,font,color)

Changing the lights in the first level to red and in the second level to blue.

Changing the game song by changing the rhythms.

changed enemies prefabe and add light.

Changing the mountains of the game and adding snow on them as well as on some parts of the ground.

Adding three bosses instead of one boss.

Changing part of the code to create or destroy objects.

.
